DL_POLY_Classic
===============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which DL_POLY_Classic installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using DL_POLY_Classic, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load DL_POLY_Classic/1.10-intel-2019b
```
